reviewText: i have watched this movie so many times over the years.i still laugh like its the first time i have seen it.really worth watching.
Title: Major Payne / Sgt. Bilko

reviewText: This is a great double bill package of two films, two funny comedies and what 's nice is that they come in one snap dvd case. it's great value both films are presented in widescreen and the transfer of the film is excellent, long live Major Payne and Sgt. Bilko  two funny films for the price of one. nice idea don't you think?  heh heh--.Highly Recommended Films.PG-13 For Language and Silly Violence
Title: Major Payne / Sgt. Bilko

reviewText: EXTREMELY FUNNY  AND  VERY ENJOYABLOE  TOO WATCH ON  A  RAINY  WEEKEND
Title: Major Payne / Sgt. Bilko

reviewText: This double-feature was a great buy.  Both of these movies provide silly but real laughs.  Damon Wayans is hilarious as Major Payne and Steve Martin adds his comedic flare as the gambling con-artist Sargent Bilko.  Fun for all ages, especially the "Military Brats.".
Title: Major Payne / Sgt. Bilko

reviewText: If you like to have a relaxing evening of fun....  both movies are a must to watch.We think laughter is a must to release so much of the stress most people are underaround the world.
Title: Major Payne / Sgt. Bilko
